name: Squirrel World
description:
Squirrel World 3D Platformer game where you incarnate a squirrel trying to clean the evil bird out of his world, getting all the 100 nut they stole and hided around the world. 

Game made over a weekend in a personnal gamejam using unity asset store.

How To Play

You goal is defined by you! it's an open platformer game where you can try to destroy all the birds but also can just collect all the nuts. The game stays fairly casual and there is little to no punishment for you to enjoy walking around and collect all the nuts. Will you find the secret ? 

Keyboard Controls

Supports the Xbox Controller

Move  —  ZQSD - Left Joystick

Camera — Mouse - Right Joystick (Camera can bug if it snaps to weird angles, didn't find the time to fix it over the weekend.. but it's still playable and finishable in this state, just not perfect, appologies!)

Space — Jump - Y

Shoot nuts — Mouse Left Click - A
